entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 12. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
